EmailTemplate.subject: eWeekly – Important Aloha Status Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly: January 28, 2021 Sign-Up Now for Important Aloha Status Information Sign-up now for our new Aloha Status Page <[[https://status.aloha.ncr.com/]]>, convenient and user-friendly online access to information about the health and performance of our software. Now, you and your customers can access information 24 x 7 x 365 on the availability and scheduled maintenance of our software products whenever you need it, including the option to receive automated updates via text, email or RSS Feed about: - Upcoming software changes and notifications, so you can plan and manage your environment accordingly - Current incident status information to keep you updated until the incident is resolved - Previous solution incident reports, including the affected components, organized by month for easy retrieval - Maintenance reports that let you know when scheduled maintenance has been completed. Encourage all your customers to subscribe today by visiting the Aloha Status Page <[[https://status.aloha.ncr.com/]]>. NCR Customer Support Model Changes Our NCR SMB Support team is hard at work transforming to simplify our structure and processes, and we’re excited about some upcoming changes that will provide customers with an improved experience.       •   Effective February 1, 2021, we are           transitioning to customer-centric           teams for Aloha/Hosted support           needs. •   We have a new PIN program that enables faster service when customers call           into NCR Support.      •   We are introducing new features in the Pulse app that give customers the           convenience to open a support case, anytime, anywhere. For more information about the Customer Support model changes read more <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/rcm/ek/va/Customer Support Comms Enterprise for Channel Newsletter 1-27-21.pdf]]>. Release Notes - Command Center Agent, version 19.2.3.63 This release is a maintenance and security update of the Command Center Agent 19.2 General Release. Due to the critical nature of the security update, NCR will push the CMC Agent version 19.2.3.63 upgrade to all CMC company trees between January 25 and March 5, 2021. For customers with labs, this release will also be available on January 20, 2021 for lab environments, so customers can conduct any internal testing.
